hero.title: <highlight>Frontend developer</highlight> crafting fast, responsive, and beautifully animated web experiences.

projects.title: Latest Projects
projects.allProjectsDescription: Explore my complete collection of work — from web applications to mobile solutions.

project1.title: Lawgorithm
project1.description: IT lawyer portfolio website and more
project1.longDescription: Lawgorithm is a professional portfolio website for an IT lawyer, showcasing expertise in technology law and legal services for IT companies. The site is created with a focus on modern design, convenient navigation, and effective service presentation. The platform includes detailed information about legal services, case studies, and contact information for potential clients.

project2.title: Creative Factory Victoria
project2.description: Multi-page website for monument restoration company
project2.longDescription: Creative Factory Victoria is a professional company specializing in the restoration and renovation of architectural monuments, historic churches, and Austrian buildings. The website is created to present the company's services, showcase completed projects, and attract new clients. The platform includes detailed information about work areas, restoration project portfolio, historical reference, and contact information.
results: Optimized performance for large content volumes

project3.title: Lnq hub
project3.description: Job platform with referral bonus system for recruiters
project3.longDescription: LNQ Hub is an innovative talent search platform that connects companies with qualified candidates through a referral system. The platform allows recruiters to find open positions, assign recommended candidates from their network, and receive bonus rewards for successful employment. The system simplifies the hiring process, reducing company costs and providing access to verified candidates through trusted connections.
results: User-friendly interface for recruiters and candidates

project4.title: Teplofasad Lviv
project4.description: Website for roof and facade repair company
project4.longDescription: Teplofasad Lviv is a professional company specializing in roof and facade repair, building insulation, and comprehensive building maintenance. The website is created to present the company's services, showcase completed projects, and attract new clients. The platform includes detailed information about roof repair services, facade insulation, work gallery, cost calculator, and a convenient ordering system for potential clients.
results: Convenient interface for service cost calculation
Improved conversion thanks to online calculator

project5.title: Botteleck deal
project5.description: Landing page and CRM system for B2B and B2C contract management
project5.longDescription: Bottleneck Deal is a comprehensive platform that combines a landing page and CRM system for contract management in B2B and B2C segments. The system allows companies to efficiently manage the contract signing process, track deal statuses, automate communications with clients and partners. The platform includes an intuitive interface for creating and editing contracts, notification system, deal analytics, and integrations to simplify business processes.
results: Effective B2B and B2C contract management system
User-friendly interface for working with clients and partners
Optimized CRM system for deal tracking

project6.title: GigaTrump coin
project6.description: Meme coin release on Dexscreener exchange
project6.longDescription: GigaTrump Coin is a meme coin release project on the decentralized Dexscreener exchange. The platform was developed for launching and promoting a cryptocurrency token with exchange integration, real-time price tracking through WebHooks, and an interactive interface for traders. The project included creating a landing page, integrating with Dexscreener API to display trading data, and implementing a market monitoring system.

project7.title: LDS admin panel
project7.description: CRM system for automatic lead distribution among buyers
project7.longDescription: LDS Admin Panel is a CRM system for automatic lead distribution among buyers. The system receives leads through WebHooks and automatically distributes them among buyers according to settings: country, working hours, workload, and other parameters. The platform includes an admin panel for managing distribution, buyer settings system, graphs and analytics of lead distribution, performance monitoring, and an automated lead assignment system based on rules and filters.
results: Automated lead distribution according to buyer settings
Effective filtering and lead assignment system

howItWorks.subtitle: How it Works
howItWorks.title: A simple and efficient workflow to bring your vision to life. From the first call to final delivery, every step is designed for clarity and efficiency.

step1.title: Initial Consultation
step1.description: We start with a deep dive into your project goals, challenges, and requirements.

step2.title: Design
step2.description: We create a design that is tailored to your project goals, challenges, and requirements.

step3.title: Development
step3.description: We develop your project to the highest standards of quality and performance.

step4.title: Launch
step4.description: We launch your project to the world and help you maintain it.

step5.title: Maintenance
step5.description: We help you maintain your project and keep it running smoothly.

contact.title: Book a Call
contact.description: Have a project in mind or just want to say hello? Book a convenient time to chat with me. I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your visions.
contact.emailDescription: Need assistance? Drop me a message anytime.
contact.phoneDescription: Need help? Give me a call—I'm here for you.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate Frontend Developer with a keen eye for detail and a love for creating beautiful, user-friendly web experiences. With years of experience in modern web technologies, I bring ideas to life through clean code and intuitive design.

experience.title: My Experience
experience.description: I've worked on numerous projects ranging from small business websites to large-scale web applications. My expertise lies in React, Next.js, TypeScript, and modern CSS frameworks. I'm constantly learning and staying up-to-date with the latest trends in web development.

approach.title: My Approach
approach.description: I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and creating seamless user experiences. Every project is an opportunity to learn something new and push the boundaries of what's possible on the web. I focus on performance, accessibility, and responsive design in everything I build.

interests.title: Beyond Code
interests.description: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing my knowledge with the developer community. I'm passionate about continuous learning and believe that the best way to grow is by helping others grow too.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.description: I specialize in modern frontend technologies and frameworks. My toolkit includes React, Next.js, TypeScript, and various CSS frameworks. I'm also experienced with design tools like Figma and animation libraries like GSAP.
skills.frontendDesc: React, Next.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Sass, Tailwind CSS
skills.toolsDesc: Git, VS Code, Figma, Adobe Creative Suite, Webpack, Vite
skills.animationDesc: GSAP, Framer Motion, CSS Animations, Micro-interactions

education.title: Education & Certifications
education.description: I believe in continuous learning and staying updated with the latest technologies. Here are some of my educational achievements and certifications.

achievements.title: Key Achievements
achievements.description: Throughout my career, I've had the opportunity to work on exciting projects and achieve significant milestones.

values.title: My Values
values.description: These core values guide my work and interactions with clients and colleagues.
values.qualityDesc: I never compromise on code quality and always strive for excellence in every project.
values.collaborationDesc: I believe the best results come from working closely with clients and understanding their vision.
values.innovationDesc: I'm always exploring new technologies and approaches to deliver cutting-edge solutions.
values.reliabilityDesc: You can count on me to deliver projects on time and within budget.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Before you ask — the answer might be here. Take a look at what our clients often want to know.
faq.question1: How long is the initial consultation, and is it free?
faq.answer1: Yes, the first consultation is free. It typically lasts between 30 to 60 minutes, depending on the complexity of your project.
faq.question2: Can I request changes to the design after it's been approved?
faq.answer2: Yes, changes are possible even after approval. However, they may affect the final timeline and cost, depending on their scope.
faq.question3: What technologies do you use for development?
faq.answer3: We use modern, reliable technologies tailored to your project's needs — from websites to complex web applications.
faq.question4: How does the project launch work?
faq.answer4: Once development is complete, we run thorough testing, finalize details with you, and go live. We can also assist with domain, hosting, and SEO setup.
faq.question5: Do you offer post-launch technical support?
faq.answer5: Yes, we provide different support plans — from basic to extended — including updates, bug fixes, and project monitoring.
faq.question6: How much will the project cost?
faq.answer6: Pricing depends on the complexity, features, and your specific requirements. A detailed quote is provided after the initial consultation.
faq.question7: Do you work with clients from other cities or countries?
faq.answer7: Absolutely. We successfully work with clients worldwide through online communication.

footer.cta: Book a call, and I'll take care of the rest
footer.ctaPart2: , and I'll take care of the rest
